ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/www.lwread.com/)){baseUrl+'catalog/'}else{var match;
var match1;
var listurl = [];
var listname = [];


var murl = /来自 <a href="([^"]+)/g;
while ((match = murl.exec(result)) != null) {
listurl.push(String(match[1]).replace(/%2F/g,'/').replace(/%3A/g,':').replace(/.*?u=/,''))};

mu = /来自 <a href=[^>]+>([^<]+)/g;
while ((match1 = mu.exec(result)) != null) {
listname.push(String(match1[1]))};

java.put('ke',listurl);
java.put('nke',listname);

var i=Math.floor(Math.random() *10 );

while(i >=listurl.length){i = i-listurl.length};

if(listurl.length==1){i=0};
result=String(listurl[i]);
java.put('key',listurl[i])}</js>
